_comment: Patient test fixtures. The agent internally uses simplified format (pathologies/habits/medical_history arrays), which is automatically transformed to the ML model format (cond_*/obs_*/med_* fields) by the API client layer. You can also provide the new format fields directly and they will be used as-is.

standard.description: Healthy young adult — high-confidence cluster, clean recommendation

high_risk.description: Multiple pathologies — aggressive relative risk rules, many pills excluded

low_confidence_cluster.description: Edge-case age profile — confidence below 0.70, tests LLM weight adjustment

minimal_candidates.description: Many contraindications — tests behavior when Safe Gate leaves very few candidates

young_healthy.description: Young patient with no conditions — all pills should be available

pcos_patient.description: PCOS patient — common use case for oral contraceptives

full_format_example.description: Example using the full ML model format with all cond_/obs_/med_ fields
